casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Donovan Wayne FLUHART, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156861
COA: 325949
334112 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to present new issue is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the April 19, 2016 and October 12, 2017 judgments of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
